See Every Red Carpet Look at the 2018 Emmy Awards

Every product on this page was chosen by a Harper's BAZAAR editor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy.

Steve Granitz Getty Images See what all your favorite TV stars are wearing the moment they hit the red carpet. Rodgers shoes.
